channel.title: Leisure on Kabads - musings, mutterings and murmerings

item.title: Cuba
item.description: Trip to Cuba Having gone to one of the best destinations I’ve probably ever been to, I felt the need to document it in a more formal way. I was inspired by the Cuban culture and vibrant life to record some of the sights I’d seen. I like the achitecture of buildings. Once they were part of the finery of Havana, but since then, people don’t have the money to upkeep this kind of large building, hence its appearance.
